description: This file defines a script that generates an OpenAPI schema by invoking the FastAPI app's openapi() method, then writes the schema JSON to a designated file path within the project's interfaces directory. It includes logic for directory creation and can be executed as a standalone script.

methods.name: generate_openapi()
methods.description: Generates the OpenAPI schema using FastAPI's app.openapi() and writes it to the interfaces/openapi.json file. Ensures the output directory exists and can be executed directly.
